metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11987 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Apache Batik 1.13 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery, caused byimproper input validation by the NodePickerPanel. By using aspecially-crafted argument, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability tocause the underlying server to make arbitrary GET requests.

criterions.comment: batik: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
